p.s: Simple data access object for csv files in php5.
p.d:
Simple data access object for csv files in php5.
by Kazuyoshi Tlacaelel.
Takes the data from a csv file and makes it accessable through a client-interface.
(NOT a driver of File_CSV) but an independent package. Please see the dependencies section for more details.
http://code.google.com/p/php-csv-parser/
INSTALL:
$ sudo pear install --force file_csv_datasource
